'''''Minecraft Education: Planet Earth III (Original Game Soundtrack)'''''<ref group=note>Originally released as ''Minecraft: Planet Earth III (Education Edition) (Original Soundtrack)''</ref> is the first soundtrack released for ''[[Minecraft]]'' by Jacob Shea and Sara Barone, which consists of the songs that were released as part of the ''{{w|Planet Earth III}}'' DLC. It was released on January 16, 2024, the same day that the DLC was released on the Marketplace.
